metadata.description: Authoring data collection forms in Excel for mobile surveys. XLSForm converts Excel files to XForms for ODK, KoBoToolbox, and similar platforms.

plugins.name: xlsform
plugins.description: Authoring data collection forms in Excel for mobile surveys. XLSForm converts Excel files to XForms for ODK, KoBoToolbox, and similar platforms. Use for field surveys, data collection, conditional forms, GPS tracking, and offline data gathering.
